name.ja: ヴォイドダスト・フュージョン

requirement.en: Shuffle 1 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type Normal Monster from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Fusion Summon a Level 9 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster with 2000 or more DEF by shuffling 2 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck as material. This turn, you can only attack with the monster Special Summoned by this effect.
